name: Loop Girl
description:
You play as Loop Girl! A girl who has the power to loop 5 seconds back in time! Learn how to use this ability, as well as the powerups you'll find throughout the game, to overcome every obstacle and defeat the evil boss waiting for you at the end.

This game was made for the A Game By Its Cover 2017 game jam.

Credits:
  • Zachary Singer - Programming & Pixel Art
  • Earl Procko - Pixel Art
  • Andrea Baroni (Cyberleaf Studios) - Music
